transArray.content: The location is pretty good, very close to the Summer Palace. Convenient parking and attentive service staff

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel, and thank you even more for taking time out of your busy schedule to encourage us. We treat every guest as our own family and strive to make every guest feel at home here, and your recognition is our greatest motivation. You can park for free by picking up an electronic parking voucher at the front desk. All the hotel staff look forward to your next visit. I wish you success in your work and a happy life! Manager: Zhao Dan
